arguments.value: ller must be owner or campaigner

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@dev Whitelist cmapigner to the user.
 @param newCampaigner Address of the user having campaigner role to be used here

@dev Balance holded by the user to see.
 @param campaignAddress Solidity address of the campaigner.

devdoc.author: Om Prakash
devdoc.details: This contract is used to store the state of the Hashbuzz contract

params.newCampaigner: Address of the user having campaigner role to be used here

associateToken(address,uint32,bool).details: Adds or removes a token from the whitelist.

params.isWhitelisted: Boolean flag to mark the token as whitelisted or not.
params.tokenType: The type of the token (1 for FUNGIBLE, 2 for NFT).

getAllWhitelistedTokens(uint32).details: Retrieves all whitelisted addresses for a given token type.

params.tokenType: The type of the token (1 for FUNGIBLE, 2 for NFT).

returns._0: An array of addresses that are whitelisted for the given token type.

getCampaignBalance(string).details: Balance holded by the user to see.

params.tokenId: Solidity address used for the account
params.tokenType: The type of the token (FUNGIBLE or NFT) [uint32] (1 for FUNGIBLE & 2 for NFT)

getNFTTokenBalance(address,address,uint3.details: Balance holded by the user to see.

params.tokenType: The type of the token (FUNGIBLE or NFT) [uint32] (1 for FUNGIBLE & 2 for NFT)                  1 for FUNGIBLE and 2 for NFT.

isTokenWhitelisted(uint32,address).details: Checks if a specific token address is whitelisted for a given token type.

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to check.
params.tokenType: The type of the token (1 for FUNGIBLE, 2 for NFT).

returns._0: Boolean flag indicating if the token is whitelisted.

devdoc.title: Utils

userdoc.notice: Deals with operations related to transactions.
